definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: The chilling sensitivity of stamen, pistil and fertilization of pepper at different stages was studied.
sentences.chinese: 現蕾期和開花期的花器官對低溫的敏感性不同。

sentences.english: This study aims on the spectral features and sensitive spectrum wave band in the apple florescence .
sentences.chinese: 旨在探索蘋果花期的光譜特徵和敏感波段。

sentences.english: The short blooming period hinders the development of the floricultural industry of moutan peonies .
sentences.chinese: 自然花期較短嚴重影響了牡丹產業的發展。

sentences.english: The gardener told me that the florescence of flowers varies by floral variety.
sentences.chinese: 花把勢告訴我們花的品種不一樣，花期也就不同。

sentences.english: Both the number of reproductive vegetative tillers and tillers were dominant at the maturity stage, but at the flowering stage.
sentences.chinese: 其營養櫱數與生殖櫱數在籽實成熟期高於開花期。

sentences.english: The distribution patterns of diseased plants seriousness in overwintering period and flowering stage were of aggregation distribution.
sentences.chinese: 病級分佈在越冬期和盛花期均爲聚集分佈。

sentences.english: However, it would not affect the floral bud differentiation and florescence.
sentences.chinese: 補光後，植株健壯，但對花芽分化和花期影響不大。

sentences.english: Thus, growers should saturate the planting with bees at bloom time.
sentences.chinese: 因此在花期，果園最好是蜜蜂滿園。

sentences.english: The results of the methods were consistent with the actual florescence of Peony.
sentences.chinese: 該模型的預測結果與牡丹的實際盛花期基本吻合。

sentences.english: Soaking seeds combined with spraying in bloom stage could increase the production even more obviously.
sentences.chinese: 浸種並配合花期噴灑，則有更加明顯的增產效果。

sentences.english: The CAD of alfalfa in early bloom was lower than that in budding stage and mid-bloom.
sentences.chinese: 紫花苜蓿初花期的CAD低於現蕾期和盛花期。

sentences.english: The CAD of alfalfa in early bloom was lower than that in budding stage and mid-bloom.
sentences.chinese: 紫花苜蓿初花期的CAD低於現蕾期和盛花期。

sentences.english: In peas there is an initial deposition of materials in the endosperm following anthesis.
sentences.chinese: 豌豆中緊隨開花期之後胚乳開始有物質積累。

sentences.english: A great scent and a longish flowering period, the flowers are white with maroon blotches.
sentences.chinese: 它氣味芳香花期又長，花朵色白有褐紅色斑點。

sentences.english: Dark respiration rate was the highest in the flowering stage and the lowest in the boll-opening stage.
sentences.chinese: 暗呼吸速率在開花期最高，吐絮期最低。
花信風，隨着花期而來的風。

definition: to bloom/to blossom/to flower/fig. to burst open/to feel happy or elated/new development grows out
variant of 臘梅|腊梅[la4 mei2]
